entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Edmundston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmundston 09:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -7.1°C
Wind: WNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Ice pellets or snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets mixed with freezing rain this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets changing to snow near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
